chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Peergreen web console is a Vaadin based modular application. There two editions for Peergreen web console : community and professional.

section.title: Community Edition
section.para: Community edition targets developers. It allows to instantiate a secured (with authentication) or unsecured (no authentication required) web console. Users can develop extensions and contribute to the web console.

section.title: Professional Edition
section.para: Professional edition is installed in profession edition of Peergreen Server. It allows to instantiate a secured web console and can not coexits with Community Edition in the same server.
